org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messages

Class ExceptionHandler<RESPONSE_TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messages.ExceptionHandler<RESPONSE_TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    RESPONSE_TYPE - The type of response passed back by the async request.

    public abstract class ExceptionHandler<RESPONSE_TYPE>
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles an exception within the context of processing an async request.

      • processException

        public void processException(java.lang.Exception e,
                    AsyncResponseProcessor<RESPONSE_TYPE> _asyncResponseProcessor)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Process an exception or rethrow it. By default, processException(Exception) is called.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception to be processed.
        _asyncResponseProcessor - The response processor for passing back a result.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
